system.description: Targets gain a +1 bonus to each damage die they deal and to Will Saves against Frightened. This bonus is doubled if a Hellspawn or Undead is the attack's Target or the one forcing the Save.
system.effect: Targets gain a +1 bonus to each damage die they deal and to Will Saves against Frightened. This bonus is doubled if a Hellspawn or Undead is the attack's Target or the one forcing the Save.
